Key.English: Set in game player options such as view distance, respawn, player persistence, crew info, player tags and more
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置游戏玩家选项,如视野距离,重生,玩家持久性,乘员信息,玩家标签等

Key.English: Over-ride default parameters for the Module Template
Key.Chinesesimp: 覆盖模块模板的默认参数

Key.English: Simply place the ALiVE Player Options module and set the appropriate parameters. You do not need to sync, position or orientate this module.
Key.Chinesesimp: 简单地放置ALIVE玩家选项模块,并设置适当的参数。你不需要同步,或定位这个模块。

Key.English: Reinitialise the ALiVE SYS Marker Store locally
Key.Chinesesimp: 在本地重新初始化ALIVE SYS标记存储
